website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for the least complicated smart thermostat, this model is your best bet.
pros: Full control of thermostat from companion app
Alexa, AppleHomeKit, and Google Home compatible
cons: No major complaints about this model

customer_reviews.title: Let down by the Wi-Fi implementation
customer_reviews.text: Works great when you figure out that you have to use a 2.4 Ghz SSID rather than a 2.4/5.0 Ghz SSID. If you try and connect the thermostat to a dual band SSID the Honeywell app won't ever see the thermostat, not sure why Honeywell can't fix this as I have other 2.4 Ghz devices that connect to a dual band SSID fine. Hoping other people who buy this will spot my review rather than spend hours like I did trying get the device connected. The device once connected works great with the Honeywell app and the Apple Hope app.
customer_reviews.author: AndyK

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Warning! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst products I’ve ever purchased. Would not connect to the WiFi and as a web developer and tech obsessed I would think I would have been able to sort it. After having changed over 10 settings on my router I still couldn’t connect. I purchased another router to see if that was the issue and it still wouldn’t work. I even rang tech support at Honeywell to get help and they where useless. Sent it back! I didn’t even want to give it one star but had to, to post this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for Cm921
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a replacement for a Honeywell CM921 wireless thermostat for my combi boiler. Took less than 30 minutes to set up. Connected to Wi-Fi easily. App is decent (improved recently apparently). I cannot comment on geo-fencing as I don't plan on using this feature yet. I have set up a scheduler for weekdays and weekends, utilising the custom set up... which is just as good as the cm921. Only drawback is the unit needs to be plugged in. The cm921 took batteries. All in all, a very good replacent.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with it.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with Alexia, unfortunately not with Samsung Smartthings, controls temperature in .5 degree increments very nicely. Am waiting to see what my gas bill is like after the winter season is over.
customer_reviews.author: Kenwyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great temperature control.
customer_reviews.text: Now that that I have it up and running I like the product. After physical installation, which was pretty straight forward and the instructions are good, I installed the app on my phone. It starts off well and seems to connect to the thermostat, you can’t increase the temperature by 0.5 degC. Once upto temperature it does seem to switch on/off to creep the temperature. Read the bit about only being allowed to connect to a 2.4GHz network rather than a 5GHz network. The controller is mains powered not battery.
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: After alot of research and confusion I went with this thermostat and receiver and I am very happy with it. No stupid hubs required like with nest, hive etc The receiver is connected to the boiler with cable. The thermostat has a wireless connection to the boiler and also connects to the WiFi. Install and set up were easy and the operation is flawless, app, alexa, Google home all work seamlessly. Temperature is always as I have set it. I do wish it was battery powered or rechargeable to be truly wireless but still overall really good.
customer_reviews.author: Tzwrtzis

customer_reviews.title: Non starter
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this especially given the make. Initial setup was ok, but i could not get the stat set up on my wifi, beware if you have post office zyxel routers it will not work. There is no solution. Also I did find at one point the temp would not change? even sat on a hot radiator it still read 21'. I have returned it disappointingly.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: Great once set up & doesn’t need a separate hub
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Honeywell crm927. Receiver wiring the same so did it myself in 10mins. Took nearly an hour to get the thermostat to connect to network & Honeywell. Inexplicably clunky set up routine, however once set up works perfectly and linked to Alexa skill straight away. A big bonus to this unit that makes it worthwhile persevering with, is that unlike thealready expensive competition you don’t need an additional expensive hub to make it work!
customer_reviews.author: ol

customer_reviews.title: Great device and intergrates with all voice assistants
customer_reviews.text: Had Honeywell’s previous version of this thermostat, this upgrade is a lot easier to setup and use. And when winter comes I can turn up the heat from my bed to keep want and set timers and schedules to keep my home comfortably warm. And intergrates with Alexa, HomeKit and Google, so you can shout at you device to turn up the heat or lower it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew O'Callaghan-Williamson

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY UNIT
customer_reviews.text: PROS GREAT USE MINE WITH APPLE HOMEKIT (SIRI MAINLY) SIMPLE TO USE OUT OF HOME CONTROL BEAUTIFUL LCD DISPLAY AND QUALITY UNIT CONS UNIT IS MAINS POWERED SO NEEDS TO BE POSITIONED NEAR A PLUG (BATTERY POWERED WOULD BE SO MUCH BETTER)
customer_reviews.author: CARROTKILLER

customer_reviews.title: Great bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bit of kit, very accurate control of temperature provided the correct location is used. We have weather compensated control on our boiler which when coupled with the optimum stop / start on this thermostat makes for a very efficient system. Like being able to adjust heating on iPad/mobile which is great. Works well with Apple home which is a more basic feature. Have not bothered with geofencing as it does not fit our lifestyle. Have not used Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: geoffc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install and setup. Works well with Alexa and so far have had no issues. My only complaint would be that I would of liked the thermostat to of been portable, as it is it has to be plugged into the mains. Nice looking unit
customer_reviews.author: NJC

customer_reviews.title: Connected thermostat that generally works well.
customer_reviews.text: This connected thermostat generally works well. Had a few problems initially with losing connection to the wifi an reporting as offline, which was a pain as this meant it could not be controlled remotely (the main reason for purchasing it). The recent app update seems to have resolved this issue. Fairly easy to wire up, if you have your boiler wiring instructions, and set up is straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Bridie

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to connect to the app
customer_reviews.text: This smart thermostat is superb. I plugged it in, it found the boiler fairly quickly and I was able to control our new Worcester combo boiler straight away. The only negative thing really is connecting my phone, via the app, to the device. It took several attempts and a YouTube video to get it to work. Now, I can't fault it. Very simple, very easy to use and it looks lovely in our front room. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation (combi) and setup
customer_reviews.text: On a combi system this was very simple to install, and the setup on screen didn't take long at all. Just make sure your WiFi signals are separated 2.4/5ghz and that your phone is on the 2.4ghz during initial setup.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed, app a little plain but works well
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, was expecting it to be comparative with the Hive but just as nice looking but does the same job. App is a little basic / plain but works well. The device sometimes complains it looses connection with the boiler receive but it sorts itself out on its own. Overall does what it's supposed to do with no monthly change
customer_reviews.author: rachael mcnally

customer_reviews.title: Best smart thermostat
customer_reviews.text: The Honeywell T6 thermostats are so easy to wire into any type of boiler installation. Following initial set up my customers have been able to set up on the Honeywell Home app and connect to the thermostat without any help. The app set up is so intuitive it guides the user through every step. I certainly wouldn't go for anything beyond the T6 as the systems get too clever for their own good. Honeywell have a nice simple easy to use product that works.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Wired version easy to set-up and continue working
customer_reviews.text: Bought the wired version, input the schedule from our previous Honeywell C2157, connected it and it worked just fine and still does. Home and Honeywell apps work with it just fine too.
customer_reviews.author: J Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you want connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Bought a year ago. Works ok on Honeywell app but fails to connect to Google which was the point of buying it! If you want connectivity don't buy this not so smart thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Check your router for compatibility
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well and with a little bit of adjusting the pre programmed scheduled times and temperatures it is ideal for running your heating system.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great product , easy install and setup . Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a combi boiler . Easy step by step set up through the app . Works great with Alexa and geofencing works well . Can’t fault it .
customer_reviews.author: Lee Stuart Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Half hour setup time, make sure 5Ghz band is switched off on your router. Honeywell Home app isn't bad. Works fine via the Alexa phone app and Echo devices. Nice and simple. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish do not buy will not connect to wifi cannot use with my phone is the main reasons for buying this item
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: WORKS SO Well
customer_reviews.text: AAA ELXCELLENT PRODUCT WELl DONE HONEYWELL I LIKE IT. GOOD BIT Of KIT
customer_reviews.author: colin

customer_reviews.title: Honeywell T6R Smart Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good order. Setup was quite easy so far does all that it said it would do
customer_reviews.author: findsuccess

customer_reviews.title: Would be awesome if not for faulty geofence
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than alternatives. Geofencing never worked. Shame as I had hopes for this feature. Thermostat looses connectivity with the app. Works well with Alexa. Honeywell app crashes now and again. Wires in easily, set up fairly easy. Knowing what I know now I don't think I'd buy it again. No support centre in UK :(
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna

customer_reviews.title: Mains powered thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit, shame it doesn't come with an option for the thermostat to be battery powered and not mains.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Clark

customer_reviews.title: Scratched, but working as expected
customer_reviews.text: Product does what it’s supposed to. The base station (not the black thermostat) was scratched. This was not a new device in any way, but i needed heating to work so I didn’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Silasi Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Life is warmer.
customer_reviews.text: Easily installed and paired with the app turning the hearing on and off away from home, or from the sofa, is simplicity itself.
customer_reviews.author: J Mo

customer_reviews.title: Time Zone
customer_reviews.text: unable to set time correctly. I have tried over and over to set the time manually. Each time it reverts to the wrong time. Unhappy and want to return for money back.
customer_reviews.author: EANDRON

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Really good thermostat that gives you he freedom at home or away to control you house temperature
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is a great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just needs a wall mounted bracket option for the thermostat as well as the desk stand
customer_reviews.author: jayf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, and can program also without wifi. Bought two of them. Could not be better.
customer_reviews.author: G Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Apple HomeKit is Seamless!
customer_reviews.text: Works a dream with Apple HomeKit. The automation is just seamless. Bit complex to wire into the boiler. You may need a plumber for that!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent, looks great and does what it says on the box
customer_reviews.author: Mr M J Ward

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and connect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant, works very well with Siri and with Apple HomeKit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Good thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and control the central heating especially when away from home
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product but bad customer support
customer_reviews.text: Now we finally got it working we absolutely love it, we had issues connecting it to our WiFi initially, when you register your account make sure you verify your email address in the email they send you otherwise you will have problems, once we done that it has been brilliant ever since. We did email Honeywell about not being able to connect but they never got back to us so their customer support is no good.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Tracey Needham

customer_reviews.title: Works with both Alexa and Apple Homekit at the same time
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with Alexa and Apple Homekit. I was worried you'd only be able to use one or the other but we use both very easily. We previously had a Honeywell CR927 connected to our combi boiler and did the installation ourselves. It was easy to DIY install, as simple as removing a few screws, swapping wires, then tightening back up.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had it for two months now all good. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Chickchicken

customer_reviews.title: The Android App is a weakness
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat is a nice looking device that is easy to install into an existing wireless system. The Android control app has recently had some problems, which make me wonder how good the long term support from Honeywell will be. Due to this I give it 3 rather than 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Leonard

customer_reviews.title: The 'go anywhere' that doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Most RF heating controls can go anywhere .. not this one. It needs to be plugged into the mains! A massive disappointment and really limits the usefulness. Sure, control it via the app so long as your home internet has not gone down, but want to take the temp controller up to your bedroom? Hope it's near a 13 amp socket. Why not battery powered? Crazy
customer_reviews.author: KevC

product_meta.title: Honeywell Home T6R Wireless Smart Thermostat — W-iFi App-Enabled to Save Money and Improve Efficiency — Compatible with Apple HomeKit, Google Home, Amazon Alexa and and IFTTT, Black (1 Piece)
product_meta.description:
Improve efficiency, save money, and integrate with other smart home devices. The Honeywell Home T6R Wireless Smart Thermostat lets you take control of your home comfort and upgrade your functionality. Made like Honeywell's popular T6 thermostat, the T6R is a wireless version that allows for a freestanding, versatile thermostat. For best results, place the thermostat controller in a room that adequately represents the temperature of your home. This innovative thermostat adapts to your schedule. And when your schedule is unpredictable, it allows you to control your thermostat via smartphone, tablet, or anywhere. The Honeywell Home app and your smartphone uses geofencing to take care of everything at home. This system uses your smartphone location to determine when you're home or away. Saving energy when you're away, ensuring the temperature is just right when you return. Honeywell Home knows how long it takes to get your home to the right temperature, removing the guesswork and saving you money on your energy bills. Ask for 21 degrees at 7am, no problem, the T6R works out how to get there, whatever the outside temperature. The intelligent comfort control helps maintain the desired temperature when you need it. So your home will always be comfy and cosy, whatever the weather. With geofence capability through the app, the T6R uses your phone's location to know if you're home or not, and sets the temperature to "away" so you're not needlessly heating your home. This capability also lets your home heat before your arrival, saving you money and keeping you energy efficient.

The T6R Wireless Smart Thermostat also works with Apple HomeKit, Amazon Alexa, Google Home and IFTTT to take care of your home comforts and keep your home connected, now and in the future. (Note: Amazon Alexa is not compatible in ES, FR, or IT). 

Easy to install and intuitive to use, this thermostat is compatible with most home heating systems. To install: Remove existing connections by turning off power and disconnecting wires from the boiler. Set up the included receiver box by connecting the thermostat wire, connecting power and connecting installation wires to the boiler. You can place the T6R wherever is convenient in your home. Restore power, download the app and follow setup instructions for connected comfort. The modern, attractive design fits perfectly into the decor of your home. Straight out of the box, it is factory pre-configured after a weekly program or 5 + 2 days. The manual programming function allows for up to 6 time slots and independent temperatures per day for better comfort. Also includes a receiver box with LED indicator and button for manual start of the boiler. One housing for piloting any type of boiler (all or nothing and Opentherm). 

People have taken comfort in Honeywell Home expertise for more than 100 years. Now you can take comfort in an innovative thermostat that adapts to your schedule, helps save you energy, and makes life easier. To create the T6R Smart Thermostat, Honeywell Home has worked with some of the best engineers. So you can take control of your home comforts, wherever you may be.



BOX CONTAINS
1 x T6R Wireless thermostat
1 x T6R AC/DC adapter
1 x 3 pin UK plug attachment
1 x 2 pin European plug attachment
1 x Wireless receiver box
4 x Fixing screws
1 x Installation guide
1 x User guide
feature_bullets: Smart, Energy Efficient Savings: The T6R is a wireless, Wi-Fi enabled thermostat that gives you control when home or away. No need to attach to a wall, this thermostat can be moved around and plugged in as necessary to charge

Clear and Intuitive: The large, backlit touch-screen makes scheduling, changing and overriding temperatures easy with a large, clear display and intuitive on-screen guidance. You have full controls from the screen, even without app connectivity
Smart Home Connection: The T6R Smart Thermostat works with Apple HomeKit, Amazon Alexa, Google Home and IFTTT to take care of your home comforts and keep your home connected, now and in the future

Control and Connect: Use Honeywell Home app to schedule and synchronise wherever you are. Geofencing capability uses your smartphone location to determine when you're home or away. Saving energy and ensuring comfortable temperatures when you return

Programmable, Adjustable, Adaptable: Choose settings to fit your lifestyle, including 7 day, 5/2 day and single-day scheduling with up to 6 different time settings per day. Adjust these remotely if plans change
Simplicity: Easy to understand, install, and use. Replaces traditional thermostats with smart, modern efficiency. Place in a central location that is a good indicator of your home's temperature
Also Includes: Receiver box that is very easy to install. Features LED indicator and button for manual start of the boiler

specifications.Included Components: 1 x T6R Smart Thermostat and Receiver Box
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars340 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
